name: Kaiju Run (itch)
description:
KaijuRun was born from the simplest idea: what if you were on a roof when kaijus strike??? Run for your life jumping and dashing, but watch out: one error and you fall or get eaten.

Also, have you ever wondered how those pesky kaijus reach for the tallest buildings?

Control with WASD + JK (jump and dash, S keeps you going)

or with arrow keys + CX (jump and dash, Down keeps you going)

DONLOADABLE WIN version available!

***DISCLAIMER: this game isn't finished, so expect minimal gameplay and incomplete graphics!***

You can wall jump a few times, to build upward momentum and save yourself from a fall, and you'll encounter some fan pushing you in the air and boxes, which work more as decorations than anything.

This game is an entry for KaijuJam 2022, and is let's say in an advance prototype-state. Browser version has same old problems of web exports: possibly laggy on sounds and etc.

Music and sfx credits: Sidearm Studios, with slight mods
